title: PlayStation's Cross-Play Comments Fall Flat - Kinda Funny Games Daily 02.12.19
description:
Start your trial month of Hims for $5 at http://forhims.com/gamesdaily

Tim and Greg recap Shawn Layden's cross-play comments, talk about what the PlayStation leadership changes means for the future, and predict tomorrow's Nintendo Direct.

Time stamps - 
00:03:00 - Housekeeping
Greg’s hosting the 22nd Annuals DICE Awards Wednesday night with Jessica Chobot. We’ll be hosting on Twitch at 8 p.m. PT.
Don’t forget the Kinda Funny World Tour rolls on! This Sunday, we’re in San Francisco at Triple Voodoo Brewery at 3 p.m. Then, it’s Kansas City on March 30th and New York on April 6th. Get the full rundown on kindafunny.com/events.
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Tom Bock, TJ Meehan, Joebeezer, Trevor Starkey, Mohammed Mohammed, and Black Jack!
The Roper Report   -
00:04:07 - PlayStation decides to talk about Cross Play, Sony Interactive Entertainment Worldwide Studios boss Layden puts foot in mouth
00:19:27 - Speaking of PlayStation, Jim Ryan is now in Charge of PlayStation
00:27:59 - Nintendo Direct Tomorrow
00:34:26 - Mass Effects Lives!
00:35:50 - Apex Legends has more than 25 Million Players
00:42:53 - Starbreeze Sells Back System Shock
00:44:40 -  ForHims
00:45:45 - Out today
Reader mail   -
00:49:25 - My question is do you think having video game characters being some form of LGBTQ is pandering? - Dan
00:56:10 - Squad Up: The Nano Biologist - Origin/PC - TheNanoBiologist - Apex Legends
00:57:14 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s host: Tim and Imran Khan

Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/kindafunnygames?sub_confirmation=1

Support us and get the shows early here! http://www.patreon.com/kindafunnygames

Check out our store! http://www.kindafunny.com/store

Follow us on Twitter!
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Kinda Funny - http://www.twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids

Every day Greg Miller and Tim Gettys talk about the biggest stories in Video Games.

Background Wall Art by Orioto - https://www.facebook.com/OriotoPosters/
